sqlMap.sql: ID, APPNO, APPLY_TYPE, CUSTCD_SALLER, CUSTCD_BUYER, MAST_CONTNO, INSERT_DATE, PURCHASE_DATE, DEBT_NUM, TOTAL_DEBT_AMOUNT, CHARGE_TYPE, FINACING_DISCOUNT_TYPE, FINACING_COST, COST, HANDLING_FEE, REDUCE_AMOUNT, TOTAL_FEE, TOTAL_REDUCE, RECEIVE_AMOUNT, COST_ACCOUNT, PAY_DAY_MONTH, RATE_COLLECT_TYPE, OVER_DUE_RATE, EXECUTE_RATE, UP_DOWN_PERCENT, UP_DOWN, BASE_RATE, RATE_ID, RATE_TYPE, BUSS_TYPE, LOAN_TYPE, BANKNO, BRCODE2, AMOUNT, APP_DATE, APP_LOAN_DATE, LOAN_DUE_DATE, RETURN_DATE, CURCD, MEMO, COMMON_DATE, TLRCD, BRCODE, RETURN_TYPE, TO_SALLER_FLAG, RETURN_AMOUNT, REASON, OTHER_REASON, ACCOUNT_NO, RETURN_METHOD, RETURN_INTEREST_AMOUNT, RETURN_CAPITAL_AMOUNT, TO_SALLER_AMOUNT, TO_POOL_AMOUNT, RETURN_ACCOUNT, TRANSACTION_NO, TOBAIL_AMOUNT, REBATE_AMOUNT, RETURN_ACCOUNT_BALANCE, TOTAL_OVER_AMOUNT, ASSIGN_RULE, SETTLE_METHOD, REPAY_PURPOSE, PAYER, PAYER_ACCT_NO, PAYER_BANK, TRANSFER_AMT, TRANSACTION_DATE
sqlMap.select:
select
distinct
from R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_INFO
order by $orderByClause$

SELECT tdbd.CNAME_SELLER,tdbd.CNAME_BUYER, tdbi.MAST_CONTNO,tdbi.BUSS_TYPE,tdbd.LOAN_WAY, tdbi.RETURN_DATE,tdbi.RETURN_METHOD,tdbi.REPAY_PURPOSE, tdbi.RETURN_AMOUNT,tdbi.TLRCD,tdbi.BRCODE,tdbd.STATUS FROM R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_INFO tdbi JOIN R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_DTL tdbd ON tdbi.appno = tdbd.appno WHERE 1 = 1
tdbd.CNAME_SELLER like '%'|| #custcdSaller_Q:VARCHAR#||'%'
tdbd.CNAME_BUYER like '%'|| #custcdBuyer_Q:VARCHAR#||'%'
tdbi.mast_Contno = #mastContno:VARCHAR#
tdbi.buss_Type = #bussType_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbd.loan_Way = #loanWay_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.brcode = #brcode:VARCHAR#
return_date>=#start_Q:VARCHAR#
return_date<=#end_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.return_Method = #returnMethod_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.repay_Purpose = #repayPurpose_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.buss_Type in
#bussTypeList[]#
and exists (select 1 from B_CRM_BASE_INFO where custcd = tdbi.custcd_saller) order by tdbi.mast_contno desc ,tdbi.return_date desc

SELECT COUNT(MAST_CONTNO) FROM ( SELECT tdbd.CNAME_SELLER,tdbd.CNAME_BUYER, tdbi.MAST_CONTNO,tdbi.BUSS_TYPE,tdbd.LOAN_WAY, tdbi.RETURN_DATE,tdbi.RETURN_METHOD,tdbi.REPAY_PURPOSE, tdbi.RETURN_AMOUNT,tdbi.TLRCD,tdbi.BRCODE,tdbd.STATUS FROM R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_INFO tdbi JOIN R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_DTL tdbd ON tdbi.appno = tdbd.appno WHERE 1 = 1
tdbd.CNAME_SELLER like '%'|| #custcdSaller_Q:VARCHAR#||'%'
tdbd.CNAME_BUYER like '%'|| #custcdBuyer_Q:VARCHAR#||'%'
tdbi.mast_Contno = #mastContno:VARCHAR#
tdbi.buss_Type = #bussType_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbd.loan_Way = #loanWay_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.brcode = #brcode:VARCHAR#
return_date>=#start_Q:VARCHAR#
return_date<=#end_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.return_Method = #returnMethod_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.repay_Purpose = #repayPurpose_Q:VARCHAR#
tdbi.buss_Type in
#bussTypeList[]#
)

sqlMap.update:
update R_BCP_DEBT_BUSS_INFO
ID = #record.id:VARCHAR#
APPNO = #record.appno:VARCHAR#
APPLY_TYPE = #record.applyType:VARCHAR#
CUSTCD_SALLER = #record.custcdSaller:VARCHAR#
CUSTCD_BUYER = #record.custcdBuyer:VARCHAR#
MAST_CONTNO = #record.mastContno:VARCHAR#
INSERT_DATE = #record.insertDate:CHAR#
PURCHASE_DATE = #record.purchaseDate:CHAR#
DEBT_NUM = #record.debtNum:DECIMAL#
TOTAL_DEBT_AMOUNT = #record.totalDebtAmount:DECIMAL#
CHARGE_TYPE = #record.chargeType:CHAR#
FINACING_DISCOUNT_TYPE = #record.finacingDiscountType:CHAR#
FINACING_COST = #record.finacingCost:DECIMAL#
COST = #record.cost:DECIMAL#
HANDLING_FEE = #record.handlingFee:DECIMAL#
REDUCE_AMOUNT = #record.reduceAmount:DECIMAL#
TOTAL_FEE = #record.totalFee:DECIMAL#
TOTAL_REDUCE = #record.totalReduce:DECIMAL#
RECEIVE_AMOUNT = #record.receiveAmount:DECIMAL#
COST_ACCOUNT = #record.costAccount:VARCHAR#
PAY_DAY_MONTH = #record.payDayMonth:VARCHAR#
RATE_COLLECT_TYPE = #record.rateCollectType:CHAR#
OVER_DUE_RATE = #record.overDueRate:VARCHAR#
EXECUTE_RATE = #record.executeRate:VARCHAR#
UP_DOWN_PERCENT = #record.upDownPercent:VARCHAR#
UP_DOWN = #record.upDown:CHAR#
BASE_RATE = #record.baseRate:VARCHAR#
RATE_ID = #record.rateId:VARCHAR#
RATE_TYPE = #record.rateType:CHAR#
BUSS_TYPE = #record.bussType:VARCHAR#
LOAN_TYPE = #record.loanType:VARCHAR#
BANKNO = #record.bankno:VARCHAR#
BRCODE2 = #record.brcode2:VARCHAR#
AMOUNT = #record.amount:DECIMAL#
APP_DATE = #record.appDate:CHAR#
APP_LOAN_DATE = #record.appLoanDate:CHAR#
LOAN_DUE_DATE = #record.loanDueDate:CHAR#
RETURN_DATE = #record.returnDate:CHAR#
CURCD = #record.curcd:CHAR#
MEMO = #record.memo:CHAR#
COMMON_DATE = #record.commonDate:CHAR#
TLRCD = #record.tlrcd:VARCHAR#
BRCODE = #record.brcode:VARCHAR#
RETURN_TYPE = #record.returnType:CHAR#
TO_SALLER_FLAG = #record.toSallerFlag:CHAR#
RETURN_AMOUNT = #record.returnAmount:DECIMAL#
REASON = #record.reason:VARCHAR#
OTHER_REASON = #record.otherReason:VARCHAR#
ACCOUNT_NO = #record.accountNo:VARCHAR#
RETURN_METHOD = #record.returnMethod:CHAR#
RETURN_INTEREST_AMOUNT = #record.returnInterestAmount:DECIMAL#
RETURN_CAPITAL_AMOUNT = #record.returnCapitalAmount:DECIMAL#
TO_SALLER_AMOUNT = #record.toSallerAmount:DECIMAL#
TO_POOL_AMOUNT = #record.toPoolAmount:DECIMAL#
RETURN_ACCOUNT = #record.returnAccount:VARCHAR#
TRANSACTION_NO = #record.transactionNo:VARCHAR#
TOBAIL_AMOUNT = #record.tobailAmount:DECIMAL#
REBATE_AMOUNT = #record.rebateAmount:DECIMAL#
RETURN_ACCOUNT_BALANCE = #record.returnAccountBalance:DECIMAL#
TOTAL_OVER_AMOUNT = #record.totalOverAmount:DECIMAL#
ASSIGN_RULE = #record.assignRule:CHAR#
SETTLE_METHOD = #record.settleMethod:VARCHAR#
REPAY_PURPOSE = #record.repayPurpose:CHAR#
PAYER = #record.payer:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCT_NO = #record.payerAcctNo:VARCHAR#
PAYER_BANK = #record.payerBank:VARCHAR#
TRANSFER_AMT = #record.transferAmt:DECIMAL#
TRANSACTION_DATE = #record.transactionDate:CHAR#
